question:
New neighbours have recently moved in, but they are making a lot of noise at night while you are preparing for your exams. Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letter:

explain that they are preventing you from studying well
suggest what they can do to improve the situation
tell them when you will have completed your studies
text: I hope you and your family are in great spirits. Also, hearty congratulations to you for moving to a new apartment.

I am writing this letter to let you know about the discomfort I usually experience each and every night owing to the loud music played by you and your family. As a result of it, I, it seems, just cannot concentrate on my studies provided that my exams are due next month.

As a suggestion, I would request you to kindly use headphones instead for the time being, until the month of September. Also, this would really help me to concentrate better since I work full-time for a consultancy firm in New Delhi and I normally have time in the evenings to study, especially onweekdays.
I am certain that you would oblige to my sincere request at the earliest. Besides, we may plan a small get-together just to know each other well.

error_list.error_des: If you do not want onweekdays to be marked as misspelled in the future, you can add it to your personal dictionary.
